description: This file defines an abstract interface for a broker, including data structures and method signatures for placing orders, retrieving positions, and getting profile info, intended to be implemented by subclasses.

classes.name: OrderResponse
classes.description: Data class representing the response received after placing an order, including order ID, status, and an optional message.

classes.name: BrokerInterface
classes.description: Abstract base class defining the minimal broker interactions needed by the application, with methods to place orders, get positions, and retrieve profile information.

methods.name: OrderResponse place_order(self, symbol: str, side: str, qty: int, price: float | None = None)
methods.description: Abstract method to place a trading order with parameters for symbol, side, quantity, and optional price. Returns an OrderResponse.

methods.name: list[dict] get_positions(self)
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve current trading positions as a list of dictionaries.

methods.name: dict get_profile(self)
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve broker profile or connection status as a dictionary.

ctags.name: place_order
ctags.pattern: /^    def place_order(self, symbol: str, side: str, qty: int, price: float | None = None) -> Order/
ctags.signature: (self, symbol: str, side: str, qty: int, price: float | None = None)
